name: RadioRockHits
0:
”Alexa, open Radio Rock Hits”
”Alexa, play Radio Rock Hits”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio rock hits
des:
Radio Rock Hits is your ultimate destination to enjoy the latest in alternative rock 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. With this skill, you can tune into Radio Rock Hits and enjoy an uninterrupted musical experience just by saying "Alexa, open Radio Rock Hits."

Main Features:

Music Playback: Access a live stream of Radio Rock Hits, offering a variety of rock, grunge, powerpop, post-punk, and more.
Playback Control: Use voice commands like "stop the radio" or "pause the radio" to control the music playback.
Song Metadata: Although currently displaying the station's logo and background, we are working on a future update to include real-time information about the song title and artist currently playing.
Available Commands:

"Alexa, open Radio Rock Hits"
"Alexa, play Radio Rock Hits"
"stop the radio"
"pause the radio"

Restrictions:

The skill requires an active internet connection to stream music.
Currently, the skill is available only in Spanish and English.
Displaying metadata for the current song (title and artist) is in development and not available in this version.
Upcoming Features:

Metadata Display: Soon, you'll be able to see the title and artist of the current song while it’s playing.
Custom Playlists: We are working to offer the ability to create and manage custom playlists.

This Radio Rock Hits skill does not collect or store any personal information from the user. It simply plays rock music from Radio Rock Hits.

Tune into Radio Rock Hits and discover great music with just a voice command!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
